snippet: FISHMAN--Ernest M. 86, of Treadwell, NY, formerly of Mt. Vernon, NY, died March 16, 2016. Survived by his loving wife Bertha Rogers, beloved sons Ted and Jamie Fishman, four grandchildren, one great-granddaughter, step-daughters Jade and Rachel Roth and four step grandchildren. Donations can be made to Catskill Area Hospice and Palliative Care (cahp.org) and Bright Hill Press and Literary Center (brighthillpress.org) 1/3
lead_paragraph: FISHMAN--Ernest M. 86, of Treadwell, NY, formerly of Mt. Vernon, NY, died March 16, 2016. Survived by his loving wife Bertha Rogers, beloved sons Ted and Jamie Fishman, four grandchildren, one great-granddaughter, step-daughters Jade and Rachel Roth and four step grandchildren. Donations can be made to Catskill Area Hospice and Palliative Care (cahp.org) and Bright Hill Press and Literary Center (brighthillpress.org) 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  FISHMAN, ERNEST M
